item.description:
Local Deal of the Month Local Investor Savvy Realtor and Investor Deb Kruzel

Deb is an ALC Member at Keller Williams because she is a top 25% producer and has been voted Cultural Icon for 2011! She specializes in creating an online presence through her blogging and youtube channel where she educates retail and investor buyers/sellers about the process. This specialty has created a considerable stream of consistent leads and is showing Deb to be a reliable expert and resource for those smart enough to follow her online.

Deb will outline:

  • The difference between working with an investor "friendly" agent vs an investor "savvy" agent
  • A recent buy/hold scenario she worked with one of her investors
  • How they found the deal
  • How they ran the numbers and determined it was a deal
  • What they did to get the deal done
  • The rehab process
  • Getting it rented before the rehab was complete

 

Monthly Meeting

6:30 pm, Thursday, February 16, 2012

Doubletree Guestsuites, 400 Soldier's Field Road, Boston

free for members; $25 for non-members

free parking
